document.full_text: the new york knicks are back in the playoffs, clinching their first postseason berth since 2004 with a victory over the cleveland cavaliers.
document.title: knicks 123, cavaliers 107: knicks end long drought and clinch playoff spot
lines_and_colors: the new york knicks are back in the playoffs, clinching their first postseason berth since 2004 with a victory over the cleveland cavaliers.
